CustomField.formula: IF ( (Now()- Last_Customer_Communication__c ) > 0, LPad(TEXT(FLOOR((Now()- Last_Customer_Communication__c))),2,"0") & "d:" & Lpad(TEXT( FLOOR( 24 * ( (Now()- Last_Customer_Communication__c) - FLOOR((Now()- Last_Customer_Communication__c)) ))),2,"0") & "h:" & Lpad(TEXT( ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ( (Now()- Last_Customer_Communication__c) - FLOOR((Now()- Last_Customer_Communication__c)) ),8) - FLOOR( ROUND( 24 * ( (Now()- Last_Customer_Communication__c) - FLOOR((Now()- Last_Customer_Communication__c)) ),8)) ),0)),2,"0") & "m" , "")
CustomField.label: Age Since Contact
